alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Henry County in southeastern Alabama, Clay, southwestern Randolph, northwestern Calhoun and northwestern Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 342 PM EDT/242 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cuthbert to near Fort Gaines. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Bellville, Bluffton, Harrisons Mill, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Zetto, Carnegie, Moye, Hayes, Pecan, Randolph Co A/p, Fountain Bridge, Shivers Mill, Ferrell Crossroads, Coleman, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Suttons Corner and Cotton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
